casebody.data:
Swofford, Inc. d/b/a Business and Commerce Center at Eden Mall and Robert Swofford, Plaintiffs,
v.
Bill Fisher d/b/a Eden Grand Prix and d/b/a Thunder Tracks USA, Defendant. No. COA16-145 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 15, 2016

AFFIRMED IN PART, DISMISSED IN PART.
